file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: '2020-09-18'
  x-release: v4
  title: AWS IoT Core Device Advisor
  description: 'AWS IoT Core Device Advisor is a cloud-based, fully managed test capability for validating IoT devices during device software development. Device Advisor provides pre-built tests that you can use to validate IoT devices for reliable and secure connectivity with AWS IoT Core before deploying devices to production. By using Device Advisor, you can confirm that your devices can connect to AWS IoT Core, follow security best practices and, if applicable, receive software updates from IoT Device Management. You can also download signed qualification reports to submit to the AWS Partner Network to get your device qualified for the AWS Partner Device Catalog without the need to send your device in and wait for it to be tested.'
  x-logo:
    url: 'https://twitter.com/awscloud/profile_image?size=original'
    backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF'
  termsOfService: 'https://aws.amazon.com/service-terms/'
  contact:
    name: Mike Ralphson
    email: mike.ralphson@gmail.com
    url: 'https://github.com/mermade/aws2openapi'
    x-twitter: PermittedSoc
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0 License
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/'
  x-providerName: amazonaws.com
  x-serviceName: iotdeviceadvisor
  x-aws-signingName: iotdeviceadvisor
  x-origin:
    - contentType: application/json
      url: 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aws/aws-sdk-js/master/apis/iotdeviceadvisor-2020-09-18.normal.json'
      converter:
        url: 'https://github.com/mermade/aws2openapi'
        version: 1.0.0
      x-apisguru-driver: external
  x-apiClientRegistration:
    url: 'https://portal.aws.amazon.com/gp/aws/developer/registration/index.html?nc2=h_ct'
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - cloud
  x-preferred: true
externalDocs:
  description: Amazon Web Services documentation
  url: 'https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iotdeviceadvisor/'
servers:
  - url: 'http://api.iotdeviceadvisor.{region}.amazonaws.com'
    variables:
      region:
        description: The AWS region
        enum:
          - us-east-1
          - us-east-2
          - us-west-1
          - us-west-2
          - us-gov-west-1
          - us-gov-east-1
          - ca-central-1
          - eu-north-1
          - eu-west-1
          - eu-west-2
          - eu-west-3
          - eu-central-1
          - eu-south-1
          - af-south-1
          - ap-northeast-1
          - ap-northeast-2
          - ap-northeast-3
          - ap-southeast-1
          - ap-southeast-2
          - ap-east-1
          - ap-south-1
          - sa-east-1
          - me-south-1
        default: us-east-1
    description: The AWSIoTDeviceAdvisor multi-region endpoint
  - url: 'https://api.iotdeviceadvisor.{region}.amazonaws.com'
    variables:
      region:
        description: The AWS region
        enum:
          - us-east-1
          - us-east-2
          - us-west-1
          - us-west-2
          - us-gov-west-1
          - us-gov-east-1
          - ca-central-1
          - eu-north-1
          - eu-west-1
          - eu-west-2
          - eu-west-3
          - eu-central-1
          - eu-south-1
          - af-south-1
          - ap-northeast-1
          - ap-northeast-2
          - ap-northeast-3
          - ap-southeast-1
          - ap-southeast-2
          - ap-east-1
          - ap-south-1
          - sa-east-1
          - me-south-1
        default: us-east-1
    description: The AWSIoTDeviceAdvisor multi-region endpoint
  - url: 'http://api.iotdeviceadvisor.{region}.amazonaws.com.cn'
    variables:
      region:
        description: The AWS region
        enum:
          - cn-north-1
          - cn-northwest-1
        default: cn-north-1
    description: The AWSIoTDeviceAdvisor endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)
  - url: 'https://api.iotdeviceadvisor.{region}.amazonaws.com.cn'
    variables:
      region:
        description: The AWS region
        enum:
          - cn-north-1
          - cn-northwest-1
        default: cn-north-1
    description: The AWSIoTDeviceAdvisor endpoint for China (Beijing) and China (Ningxia)
x-hasEquivalentPaths: true
paths:
  /suiteDefinitions:
    post:
      operationId: CreateSuiteDefinition
      description: Creates a Device Advisor test suite.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateSuiteDefinitionResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                suiteDefinitionConfiguration:
                  description: Gets Suite Definition Configuration.
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    suiteDefinitionName:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuiteDefinitionName'
                        - description: Gets Suite Definition Configuration name.
                    devices:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceUnderTestList'
                        - description: Gets the devices configured.
                    intendedForQualification:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/IntendedForQualificationBoolean'
                        - description: Gets the tests intended for qualification in a suite.
                    rootGroup:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/RootGroup'
                        - description: Gets test suite root group.
                    devicePermissionRoleArn:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/AmazonResourceName'
                        - description: Gets device permission arn.
                tags:
                  description: The tags to be attached to the suite definition.
                  type: object
                  minProperties: 0
                  maxProperties: 50
                  additionalProperties:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/String256'
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Content-Sha256'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Date'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Algorithm'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Credential'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Security-Token'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Signature'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-SignedHeaders'
    get:
      operationId: ListSuiteDefinitions
      description: Lists the Device Advisor test suites you have created.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ListSuiteDefinitionsResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
      parameters:
        - name: maxResults
          in: query
          required: false
          description: The maximum number of results to return at once.
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 1
            maximum: 50
        - name: nextToken
          in: query
          required: false
          description: A token used to get the next set of results.
          schema:
            type: string
            maxLength: 2000
  '/suiteDefinitions/{suiteDefinitionId}':
    delete:
      operationId: DeleteSuiteDefinition
      description: Deletes a Device Advisor test suite.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeleteSuiteDefinitionResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
      parameters:
        - name: suiteDefinitionId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite definition Id of the test suite to be deleted.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Content-Sha256'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Date'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Algorithm'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Credential'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Security-Token'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Signature'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-SignedHeaders'
    get:
      operationId: GetSuiteDefinition
      description: Gets information about a Device Advisor test suite.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetSuiteDefinitionResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
        '482':
          description: ResourceNotFoundException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResourceNotFoundException'
      parameters:
        - name: suiteDefinitionId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite definition Id of the test suite to get.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
        - name: suiteDefinitionVersion
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Suite definition version of the test suite to get.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 2
            maxLength: 255
    patch:
      operationId: UpdateSuiteDefinition
      description: Updates a Device Advisor test suite.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateSuiteDefinitionResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
      parameters:
        - name: suiteDefinitionId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite definition Id of the test suite to be updated.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                suiteDefinitionConfiguration:
                  description: Gets Suite Definition Configuration.
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    suiteDefinitionName:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuiteDefinitionName'
                        - description: Gets Suite Definition Configuration name.
                    devices:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceUnderTestList'
                        - description: Gets the devices configured.
                    intendedForQualification:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/IntendedForQualificationBoolean'
                        - description: Gets the tests intended for qualification in a suite.
                    rootGroup:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/RootGroup'
                        - description: Gets test suite root group.
                    devicePermissionRoleArn:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/AmazonResourceName'
                        - description: Gets device permission arn.
  '/suiteDefinitions/{suiteDefinitionId}/suiteRuns/{suiteRunId}':
    get:
      operationId: GetSuiteRun
      description: Gets information about a Device Advisor test suite run.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetSuiteRunResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
        '482':
          description: ResourceNotFoundException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResourceNotFoundException'
      parameters:
        - name: suiteDefinitionId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite definition Id for the test suite run.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
        - name: suiteRunId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite run Id for the test suite run.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Content-Sha256'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Date'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Algorithm'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Credential'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Security-Token'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Signature'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-SignedHeaders'
  '/suiteDefinitions/{suiteDefinitionId}/suiteRuns/{suiteRunId}/report':
    get:
      operationId: GetSuiteRunReport
      description: Gets a report download link for a successful Device Advisor qualifying test suite run.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetSuiteRunReportResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
        '482':
          description: ResourceNotFoundException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResourceNotFoundException'
      parameters:
        - name: suiteDefinitionId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite definition Id of the test suite.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
        - name: suiteRunId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite run Id of the test suite run.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Content-Sha256'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Date'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Algorithm'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Credential'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Security-Token'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Signature'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-SignedHeaders'
  /suiteRuns:
    get:
      operationId: ListSuiteRuns
      description: 'Lists the runs of the specified Device Advisor test suite. You can list all runs of the test suite, or the runs of a specific version of the test suite.'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ListSuiteRunsResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
      parameters:
        - name: suiteDefinitionId
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Lists the test suite runs of the specified test suite based on suite definition Id.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
        - name: suiteDefinitionVersion
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Must be passed along with suiteDefinitionId. Lists the test suite runs of the specified test suite based on suite definition version.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 2
            maxLength: 255
        - name: maxResults
          in: query
          required: false
          description: The maximum number of results to return at once.
          schema:
            type: integer
            minimum: 1
            maximum: 50
        - name: nextToken
          in: query
          required: false
          description: A token to retrieve the next set of results.
          schema:
            type: string
            maxLength: 2000
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Content-Sha256'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Date'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Algorithm'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Credential'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Security-Token'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Signature'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-SignedHeaders'
  '/tags/{resourceArn}':
    get:
      operationId: ListTagsForResource
      description: Lists the tags attached to an IoT Device Advisor resource.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ListTagsForResourceResponse'
        '480':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
        '481':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '482':
          description: ResourceNotFoundException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResourceNotFoundException'
      parameters:
        - name: resourceArn
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The ARN of the IoT Device Advisor resource.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 20
            maxLength: 2048
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Content-Sha256'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Date'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Algorithm'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Credential'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Security-Token'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Signature'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-SignedHeaders'
    post:
      operationId: TagResource
      description: Adds to and modifies existing tags of an IoT Device Advisor resource.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TagResourceResponse'
        '480':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
        '481':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '482':
          description: ResourceNotFoundException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResourceNotFoundException'
      parameters:
        - name: resourceArn
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The resource ARN of an IoT Device Advisor resource.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 20
            maxLength: 2048
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - tags
              properties:
                tags:
                  description: The tags to be attached to the IoT Device Advisor resource.
                  type: object
                  minProperties: 0
                  maxProperties: 50
                  additionalProperties:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/String256'
  '/suiteDefinitions/{suiteDefinitionId}/suiteRuns':
    post:
      operationId: StartSuiteRun
      description: Starts a Device Advisor test suite run.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/StartSuiteRunResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
        '482':
          description: ConflictException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConflictException'
      parameters:
        - name: suiteDefinitionId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite definition Id of the test suite.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                suiteDefinitionVersion:
                  description: Suite definition version of the test suite.
                  type: string
                  minLength: 2
                  maxLength: 255
                suiteRunConfiguration:
                  description: Gets suite run configuration.
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    primaryDevice:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/DeviceUnderTest'
                        - description: Gets the primary device for suite run.
                    selectedTestList:
                      allOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SelectedTestList'
                        - description: Gets test case list.
                tags:
                  description: The tags to be attached to the suite run.
                  type: object
                  minProperties: 0
                  maxProperties: 50
                  additionalProperties:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/String256'
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Content-Sha256'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Date'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Algorithm'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Credential'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Security-Token'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Signature'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-SignedHeaders'
  '/suiteDefinitions/{suiteDefinitionId}/suiteRuns/{suiteRunId}/stop':
    post:
      operationId: StopSuiteRun
      description: Stops a Device Advisor test suite run that is currently running.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/StopSuiteRunResponse'
        '480':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '481':
          description: ResourceNotFoundException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResourceNotFoundException'
        '482':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
      parameters:
        - name: suiteDefinitionId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite definition Id of the test suite run to be stopped.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
        - name: suiteRunId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Suite run Id of the test suite run to be stopped.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 12
            maxLength: 36
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Content-Sha256'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Date'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Algorithm'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Credential'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Security-Token'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Signature'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-SignedHeaders'
  '/tags/{resourceArn}#tagKeys':
    delete:
      operationId: UntagResource
      description: Removes tags from an IoT Device Advisor resource.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UntagResourceResponse'
        '480':
          description: InternalServerException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternalServerException'
        '481':
          description: ValidationException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValidationException'
        '482':
          description: ResourceNotFoundException
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResourceNotFoundException'
      parameters:
        - name: resourceArn
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The resource ARN of an IoT Device Advisor resource.
          schema:
            type: string
            minLength: 20
            maxLength: 2048
        - name: tagKeys
          in: query
          required: true
          description: List of tag keys to remove from the IoT Device Advisor resource.
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/String128'
            minItems: 0
            maxItems: 50
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Content-Sha256'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Date'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Algorithm'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Credential'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Security-Token'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-Signature'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-Amz-SignedHeaders'
components:
  parameters:
    X-Amz-Content-Sha256:
      name: X-Amz-Content-Sha256
      in: header
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    X-Amz-Date:
      name: X-Amz-Date
      in: header
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    X-Amz-Algorithm:
      name: X-Amz-Algorithm
      in: header
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    X-Amz-Credential:
      name: X-Amz-Credential
      in: header
      schema:
        type: string
